Name: Good Shelf: In the Forest of Blessings
Desc: A dynamic and energetic "Good Shelf," this origami decoration features sturdy and reliable trays and shrub-shaped displays ideal for showing off figurines related to the fairytale Forest of Blessings.\nIt is said that the most important task for a "Good Shelf" is to honestly protect all things. Thus, whether the joyous jumping contest of Rainsong Pond, the raucous banquets of the Calligraphy Tavern, or the stunning scenery of the Kingdom of Breezes and Bells, all can be recreated without reservation by this Good Shelf.
